column3: Weight (1=completely unimportant, 2= unimportant, 3= indifferent, 4= important, 5=absolutely important)
column4: Confidence  (1=very low, 2= low, 3= half sure, 4= high, 5=very high)

column5: They are the copies of the sentences from the original corpus
There are sentences which don't have direct relation to the text
As they are copies from the main text
